## HLQTYStake class

Represents a user's HLQTY stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HLQTYStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getHLQTYStake()](./lib-base.readableliquity.gethlqtystake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `HLQTYStake` class.

|  [stakedHLQTY](./lib-base.hlqtystake.stakedhlqty.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | The amount of HLQTY that's staked. |
